programme.title: Cuba after the fall of the USSR
programme.short_synopsis: Cuba's remarkable post-Soviet economic survival and Pope John Paul II's 1998 visit.
programme.medium_synopsis: Considering Cuba's remarkable economic survival after the loss of Soviet support, the history of US-Cuban relations, and a visit to the island by Pope John Paul II.
